page.title: 19A SENIOR CITIZEN' DAY
page.content: I usually get up at about 6.30 a.m. and have my breakfast of toast, marmalade and grapefruit.Then I dress and then perhaps do one of my hobbies. I have many hobbies and a few of them are to do with needlework but my favourite hobby is gardening.Also in the morning I do the newspaper crossword and I usually have friends for coffee or I visit friends.After lunch I sit down and put my feet up.I attend a lot of meetings as I am involved with the W.I.,the Save the Children Fund and the Parish Council. In the evening I sometimes watch television. My favourite programmes are about gardening and nature.I also like Coronation Street,Emmerdale Farm and One Man and His Dog.I also like to watch the 'fuddy-duddy' programmes. When I go to bed I always have a good night's sleep.
